title.value: Effect of mineral fertilizers and brassinosteroids on flax oil productivity and nutrients removal
Влияние минеральных удобрений и брассиностероидов на продуктивность льна масличного и вынос элементов питания

journal.title: Soil Science and Agrochemistry : scientific journal

person.name: Gavryushin, I.Yu., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied the effect of mineral fertilizers and brassinosteroids on physiological and biological processes of crop development, their efficiency on flax oil (Linum usitatissimum), and nutrients removal. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus in 2010-2012 on the experimental field 'Tushkovo' of Belarus State Academy of Agriculture (Gorki, Belarus). As a result of realized research with flax oil variety Brestskij of flax oil it was revealed the high efficiency of this crop in the north-eastern part of Belarus: seed yield up to 24.7 c/ha with oil content 48.6%. The nutrient status of the plants depended on the applied mineral fertilizers and plant growth regulators. The better conditions for the supply of flax basic nutrients and increase its productivity provided double processing of crops with brassinosteroids (early phase of 'fur-tree' in tank mixtures with herbicides and micronutrients complexonate Polycom L in the budding stage in tank mixtures with fungicide Derozal) on background of complex NPK fertilizer application.
